revised_title: Lidar Applications in Studying Air Pollution and Chimney Plumes
tldr: The authors discuss the application of lidar technology in studying air pollution and chimney plumes. They describe the performance of a lidar system, its limitations, and improvements made to the equipment. Lidar observations have been used to predict pollution concentration at the ground and provide insights into plume behavior and environmental factors.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
